scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a seated figure, likely the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, cradling a cross. The figure has a halo, indicating sanctity. The background is a textured red, with areas of white and some darker splotches. The cross is rendered in a pale color, with a golden element near its center. The overall impression is one of sorrow and devotion, with the figure appearing to be in mourning or contemplation of the crucifixion.
